item.title: UT-79 East at I-84 West/I-15 North
item.description: UT-79 East (W 31st St.) at I-84 West/I-15 North to Brigham City.

item.title: UT-79 East at I-84 East/I-15 South
item.description: UT-79 East at I-84 East/I-15 South (Exit 341). Use I-84 East/I-15 South to Salt Lake City. Continue over freeway for I-15 North/I-84 West to Brigham City.

item.title: UT-79 East at UT-126
item.description: UT-79 East (Hinckley Drive) at UT-126 (N 1900 W) in Roy. Use UT-79 East for I-15.

item.description: UT-204 South (Wall St.) at UT-79 (W 30th St) in Ogden.

item.title: I-15 South Exit 341AB and Exit 340
item.description: I-15 South at Exit 344B - UT-79 West/Hinckley Drive. Approaching Exit 344A - UT-79 East/31st St. Approaching Exit 343 - I-84 East/Riverdale/Cheyenne.

item.title: I-15 South Exits 341A and 340
item.description: I-15 South/I-84 East at Exit 341A - UT-79 East/31st St. Approaching Exit 340 - I-84 East/Riverdale/Cheyenne (Wyoming).
